structure.unit: Chapter 8AA CABLE AND COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS
ARTICLE III. PUBLIC RIGHTS-OF-WAY REGULATIONS FOR COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8AA-152.1. Protection of underground utilities
In connection with excavation in the Public Rights-of-Way, Providers, where applicable, shall comply with the requirements of Article XIII.5 of of the Code of Miami-Dade County.
